title: Kailash Mansarovar Yatra 13 Nights 14 Days Overland
best_time: May, June, July, August, September, October
description: Embark on the sacred journey to Mount Kailash and Lake Mansarovar, one of the most revered pilgrimage sites in Hinduism, Buddhism, Jainism, and Bon religion. This 13-day overland journey from Kathmandu offers a transformative spiritual experience through the mystical landscapes of Tibet.
highlights: Holy bath and prayers at Lake Mansarovar
Spiritual journey through pristine Tibetan landscapes
Cultural immersion in Tibetan Buddhist traditions
Gamow bag for altitude sickness prevention
inclusions: Traditional welcome on arrival
03 Night accommodation at Kathmandu on sharing Twin/Double basis(03 Star Premium)
01 Night accommodation at Kyirung on sharing basis(Basic Hotel)
09 Night accommodation in Tibet on sharing basis(Hotels  and Guest houses)
Professional guide throughout the journey
Tibet travel Permit & Visa fees
English speaking Tibetan guide for customers formalities
Nepali Supporting Staff(cook,Sherpa & helper) 5:1 basis
Buffet vegetarian meals during Yatra on AP basis(Breakfast,Lunch & Dinner)
Nepali experienced Team Leader/Guide during Yatra
Supporting truck to carry equipment
Mansarovar and Kailash Yatra Permit fees
Duffel bag for carrying goods during Yatra
Duffel bag for carrying goods during Yatra
Back pack bag for personal items to carry and Cap
Warm down Jacket refundable
First aid medical kit bag & Oxygen cylinder
Emergency evacuation management during Yatra
Round trip transportation in Tibet AC Luxury coach
Kathmandu - Rasuwagadi - Kathmandu A/C Vehicle
Arrival and departure transfer with assistance by A/C Vehicle
exclusions: Medical expenses and Emergency rescue evacuation expenses
Tips for Guide, Porter, driver and personal expenses
Extra Hotel charges in Kathmandu if early return from Tibet
Any additional cost due to natural calamities and unforeseen circumstances
Visa splitting charge and extra transportation cost, if returning early from Yatra

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu (1300m)
itinerary.description: Upon arrival at Kathmandu International Airport, you will be greeted and assisted by our representative after completing custom formalities. Transfer to hotel for check-in. Evening yatra briefing session before dinner covering important aspects of the Kailash Mansarovar Yatra.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Temple Visit
itinerary.description: After breakfast, embark on Kathmandu city sightseeing tour. Visit Pashupatinath Temple, Boudhanath Stupa (World Heritage Site), Jal Narayan Temple (Sleeping Vishnu), and Kathmandu Durbar Square (Living God Kumari). Return to hotel for packing and preparation for the yatra.

itinerary.title: : Kathmandu - Drive to Kyirung(1600 m)
itinerary.description: Our representative will pick up you, drive to Kyirung(145 Km ,05/06 Hrs),arrive at Kyirung transfer to hotel for check in. Overnight at  Kyirung Guest house.

itinerary.title: Kyirung- Drive to  Gyirung County(2800m)
itinerary.description: After breakfast complete immigration and custom formalities in Nepal and China both side continue drive to Gyirung(35 Km ,1 Hrs 2800m). Arrive at Gyirung transfer to hotel for check in. overnight at Gyirung.

itinerary.title: Gyirung County Acclimatation(2800m)
itinerary.description: After breakfast you are free for visit around Gyirung county or shopping . Overnight at Gyirung County.

itinerary.title: Gyirung - Drive to Saga (4500M ,270 km 06/07 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Saga crossing Bramhaputra river(270 km, 6/7 Hrs),Arrive at Sanga transfer to hotel for check in. Overnight at Saga hotel.

itinerary.title: Saga - Drive to  Mansarovar (4550M ,470 km 08/09 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive towards Mansarovar lake (470 Km, 08/09 Hrs),Arrive at Mansarovar lake transfer to guest house for check in .Overnight at Mansarovar lake.

itinerary.title: Mansarovar Parikrama - Drive to Darchen (4600 m)
itinerary.description: After breakfast Parikrma of Mansarovar lake by vehicle (102 Km,3 Hrs) take Holy bath, Perform Puja(prayer ritual, Homa at Mansarovar lake, continue drive to Darchen (58 Km ,1.5 Hrs).Arrive at Darchen transfer to hotel for check in. overnight at Darchen.

itinerary.title: Darchen Darshan Yamdwar - Trek to Diraphuk (4860m, 12 Km - First Day of Kora )
itinerary.description: After breakfast short drive to Yamddwar, visit Yama Dwar.This is starting point of Kora.We will trek to Diraphuk which is 12 km trek (7/8 Hrs) crossing west face of Mt.Kailash,You will visit North face of Mt.Kailash. Arrive at Diraphuk transfer to hotel for check in. Overnight at Diraphuk. Overnight at a Hotel in Diraphuk.

itinerary.title: Diraphuk - Trek to Zutalphuk (4600M,22 Km - 2nd day of Kora)
itinerary.description: After breakfast trek to Dolma - La Pass and proceed to Zutalphuk(22 Km,12 hrs Trek). This is the most difficult journey throughout the the Yatra since you have to trek up to (5630m) height. From decent to Gaurikund and trek to Zutulphuk following river. Arrive at Zutalphuk transfer, check in to hotel. overnight at Zutalphuk at Huest house.

itinerary.title: Zutalphuk - Trek to Darchen(08 Km, 03 Hrs) - Drive to Saga (4500M - 3rd day of Kora)
itinerary.description: After breakfast short trek( 8 Km,2 Hrs) and reach to the point where our coach will be waiting and we will drive to Darchen and merge with other member who were waiting and drive to Saga. Arrive at saga transfer to hotel for check in.overnight at saga.

itinerary.title: Saga - Drive to Gyirung County(2800M ,270 Km,07 Hrs)
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Gyirung(270 km, 7 hrs). Arrive at Gyirung transfer to hotel for check in. Overnight at Gyirung

itinerary.title: Gyirung County  - Drive to Kathmandu  (1300 M, 200 Km 08 Hrs))
itinerary.description: After breakfast drive to Kathmandu crossing Nepal - China both side Border formalities continue drive to Kathmandu arrive at Kathmandu  transfer to hotel for check in.Overnight at Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu departure transfer
itinerary.description: After breakfast we will be provide appreciation certificate of Kailash Mansarovar Yatra later drop to airport for final departure

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure

important_notes.health_requirements: Medical examination recommended before travel. Participants should be examined by a doctor to assess health condition and ability to cope with high altitude travel, extreme cold, dust, and trekking to 19,500ft during parikrama.
important_notes.altitude_sickness: Travelers are likely to experience altitude sickness symptoms (headache, loss of appetite, nausea, exhaustion, sleeplessness, breathlessness) until body adjusts. Mandatory 2 nights stay at Mansarovar (4550m) for acclimatization. Diamox tablets recommended. Gamow bag provided for altitude sickness prevention.
important_notes.currency: Chinese Yuan is the local currency. USD 1 = 7.02 Yuan & 1 Yuan = INR 11.90 approx. Money can be exchanged at Bank of China at Kyirung county.
what_to_bring: Thermal underwear, warm trousers & woolen shirts
Warm sweaters, woolen gloves, sun hat
Strong water bottle & water purifying tablets
Personal medical kit and Diamox tablets
Wet tissues and personal hygiene items
important_notes.risks_liability: All tours in Tibet are conducted under Tibet Tourism Bureau (TTB) rules and regulations. Company shall not be responsible for changes due to unavoidable circumstances such as landslide, road blockage, flood, snow, political unrest, flight cancellation, delays, sickness or accidents. Extra costs shall be borne by clients.
